name: Queen of Hearts
subtitle: Capricious Monarch
author: Jenna Gray

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If an opposing character challenges a character during their ownerâ€™s turn and is banished during the challenge can I ready my Queen of Hearts- Capricious Monarch using her Off With Their Heads! ability?

A: Yes, you can.

flavor_text: The fourth Rule of Villainy: Do whatever it takes to get ahead.
rules_text: OFF WITH THEIR HEADS! Whenever an opposing character is banished, you may ready this character.
